pullrequest.title: Building editor: Import background image and improve add/delete levels

content.raw: I tried to paste, but it would accept the text. When I typed it in manually, it would only accept 3 decimal places, but the text I was trying to paste had 4 decimal places. So it looks like it just ignored all the text I was trying to paste.
content.html: I tried to paste, but it would accept the text. When I typed it in manually, it would only accept 3 decimal places, but the text I was trying to paste had 4 decimal places. So it looks like it just ignored all the text I was trying to paste.
